meanings.definition: The process of setting type for printing using a Linotype machine.
meanings.sent1: Linotyping requires skill and precision to create printed text.
meanings.sent2: The linotyping process revolutionized the printing industry.
meanings.sent3: I tried linotyping at the workshop, and it felt like magic!
meanings.sent4: In the world of printing, linotyping is the heartbeat of efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The art of linotyping transforms words into tangible pages.

meanings.definition: The act of operating a Linotype machine to produce printed material.
meanings.sent1: After mastering linotyping, he could produce newspapers quickly.
meanings.sent2: Linotyping was a common job in printing houses in the past.
meanings.sent3: The linotyping room was always noisy with clanking machines.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the linotyping keys, creating stories.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sound of linotyping filled the printing press.
